title: Banning System Bias
body: This new tribunal system is absolutely stupid and one sided, getting matchmaked with absolute noobs that dont even know how to play game. Being in the silver division you would think people would know simple skills such as ganking and pushing lanes. Then I get banned for flaming when I'm matchmaked with absolute retards and try to tell them how to play, yet they can swear their faces off and they dont get banned, yet I get a 2 week suspension. Riot fix your game, its honestly turning into an absolute piece of trash being full of young kids and instalockers. honestly done with this game and the way its headed, fix your sh*t.
